strIntroduction: This tour is only for certificated divers (OW / AOW / MASTER). Known as one of the summertime must-go places, Jeju Island not only has significant scenery on land but breeds abundance of living creatures under the sea. Just come to experience abundant diving mode in Jeju!

strIntroduction: Are you now planning your first Jeju trip? If you are still wondering where to go, let KKday gives you a hand! Known as the biggest teddy bear museum and shooting spot of famous drama, Princess Hours, Jeju Teddy Bear Museum exhibits all kinds of teddy bear that you could imagine! So remember to pay a visit to this fantasy place when you're in Jeju!
strTitle: Teddy Bear Museum in Jeju Island

strIntroduction: You can not only appreciate the beauty of traditional architecture but touch and experience Korean traditional culture in Bukchon Hanok Village. Handmade Danqing painting accessories are really suitable for memorial or gift for friends!
strTitle: Making your own souvenir! Bukchon Hanok Village Danqing Painting DIY

strIntroduction: If you want to know more about Korean culture, you can never miss the opportunity to experience kimchi DIY and wearing hanbok! Besides, you can bring your own kimchi home!
strTitle: Lee’s House Korean Home Culture Experience Tickets

strIntroduction: Are you looking for a special tour experience in Korea? Customized schedule arrangement with a private tour guide will definitely suit you!
strTitle: 【DOUBLE LUXURY】Customized Comprehensive Tour in Korea

strIntroduction: The most delicious musical ever! Combing Korea traditional meal with creative ideas and astonishing beatbox performance, BIBAP will surely entertain you and make you a wonderful night!
strTitle: Musical Bibap Show tickets

strIntroduction: Confident about your cooking skills and curious about Korean cuisine? Book this intermediate-level cooking class in the heart of Seoul, and prepare five dishes for lunch or dinner under the watchful eye of a professional chef. Depending on the day, you'll make either a Korean barbecue or a vegetarian feast that reflects the cooking of Korean Buddhist monks. Finish your class in the best way possible — sit down and savor your creations.
strTitle: Experience Seoul: Korean Intermediate Cooking Class

strIntroduction: Life is food so food needs to be good! Let's skip the tasteless food and explore culinary in Seoul with your own personal food expert!
strTitle: Come and have an ultimate food tour in Seoul

strIntroduction: I hate carrying huge luggage when I'm abroad. Do you have the same annoyance like me every time you have a flight? Let luggage delivery service to and from airport and Seoul gives you the most of your valuable travel!
strTitle: Incheon and Gimpo International Airport luggage delivery service

strIntroduction: Located at Hongik University area which is known as a popular spot among teenagers. It's not only a normal exhibition, but an unique art space that allows you to experience the fantastic magic between eroticism and art in an interesting way. Free yourself, there is no reason to be shy here!
strTitle: Seoul Love Museum tickets (for adults only)

strIntroduction: Best family tour in summer! Enjoy water activities in One mount water park, the shooting spot of Running man. Then, head to children's favorite aquarium. Leave some beautiful memory for Korea tour!
strTitle: One Mount water park+Aqua Planet+Outlet one-day tour

strIntroduction: See the sights of Seoul by night on this 4.5-hour tour and Han river cruise. Start with a ferry boarding for a scenic 1-hour Han river cruise, passing bridges and spotting landmarks along the waterfront as you listen to music and narration from your guide. Then ride a cable car to the observation deck at N Seoul Tower, an ideal place to view Seoul's cityscape.
strTitle: [Fantabulous Night]Han River Cruise and N Seoul Tower
Private Busan City Tour Including Gamcheon Culture Village and Beomeosa Temple

strIntroduction: The Trick Eye Museum, located at HongDae is an art gallery with paintings using trompe l'oeil techniques that give each 2D art piece the illusion of being in 3D. If you still wanna take more funny pictures, don't miss the opportunity to explore the Ice castles in Ice Museum!
strTitle: 3D Trick Eye Museum & Ice Museum tickets

strIntroduction: 我們將帶你前往韓劇“來自星星的你”的熱門景點小王子村(小法國)及韓國旅遊必去景點-南怡島，體驗韓國近郊戶外風景，品嚐道地料理春川炒辣雞。再加上running man也去過的江村鐵路自行車，精選一日遊是你絕對不可錯過的經典之旅!
strTitle: Petite France, Namiseom Island, Raibike One-Day Tour

strIntroduction: 全家來韓國旅遊，上有老下有小，還要自己做功課、找線路好煩啊，這行程完全～免擔心！現在，提供中文導遊全程包車陪同，只要帶著一顆愉悅心，想去哪就陪你去哪，解決任何旅遊中大大小小的事情，順利完成夢想中的旅遊行程！
strTitle: 【懶人旅遊】首爾自選行程，中文私人導遊帶你玩

strIntroduction: Have you ever dreamed to dress up like characters in Korean court drama? Various kinds of hanbok are waiting for you to experience!
strTitle: Jeju Hanbok Experience

strIntroduction: Are you curious about what the most popular things in Seoul? You must not to miss the rickshaw, experience in Hongdae!
strTitle: New way to experience Seoul! Riding a rickshaw in Hongdae

strIntroduction: Our Night Dining Tour gets you feeling like a local as you’ll visit famous restaurants that specialize in Korean barbecue, rice beer, and we’ll visit the famous, traditional Kwangjang market which is famous for their crispy mung bean pancakes. Our fun and knowledgable guides will give you insights into Korean culture and teach you eating and drinking customs and even teach you fun Korean phrases and drinking games. It is a night of great food, friends, and drinks you’ll never forget.
strTitle: KOREAN NIGHT DINING TOUR

strIntroduction: Instead of knowing the history between South and North Korea through media, we should visit this place personally, shouldn't we? Come and see the Military Demarcation Line and learn about the Korean War once you travel in Korea!
strTitle: 【Mysterious 38 Degree North】DMZ Korea one-day Tour

strIntroduction: 出國旅遊時總是想要有效率的玩遍所有景點，卻又懶得做功課嗎？在地偶吧帶你輕鬆走透透，包車遊遍釜山20個必玩點任你選，給你最美好的釜山回憶！
strTitle: 【釜山人帶路】釜山走透透！精選20個必遊景點任你遊

strIntroduction: Do you want to experience something special in Korea? Here you can experience traditional tie-dye with ancient Korea pattern and leave a unforgettable memory! In bukchon hanok Village, you can not only learn relative knowledge but also appreciate beautiful scenery.
strTitle: Bukchon DIY Tie-dye handkerchief

strIntroduction: Under the approval of the United Nations, come and take a guided tour to the border of South and North Korea! Besides paying a visit to sightseeing spots, such as Panmunjoma and JSA, you can also enjoy the mysterious atmosphere and experience the historical significance of the armistice zone.
strTitle: A day-trip to Joint Security Area (JSA), Panmunjom

strIntroduction: Known as one of the New7Wonders of Nature, Jeju Island has significant and breathtakng scenery both on land and under the sea! Wanna have a look what's the New7Wonders scene under the sea level look likes? Just come and let Seogwipo Submarine offers you the opportunity to soak in the stunning view!
strTitle: Seogwipo Submarine adventure tour

strIntroduction: When Fanta-Stick’s beating starts, your heart-beat will go up to the highest with the percussion sounds. You should never miss this heart-beating sounds of powerful percussion rhythm and Heart-filling melodies of beautiful Gukak!
strTitle: Fanta Stick Show Ticket

strIntroduction: In the Korean Folk Village, where the customs and lifestyles of past generations of Korean have been faithfully maintained without impairment, various lifestyles prevalent during the Joseon Dynasty can be experienced.
strTitle: Korean Folk Village Ticket

strIntroduction: Does museum sound uninteresting to you? Have you ever imagined that you'll burst into laughter at there? The biggest 4D museum in Korea that breaks down the stereotype of museums and combines art pieces with interaction! Wanna try something fun? Come to the Alive Museum and make some funny faces beside those paintings!
strTitle: Korea 4D Alive Museum tickets

strIntroduction: Various subject of 3D painting will change every 5 minutes. No matter with family or friends, you can take the funniest and most creative photo here! Besides, there is also unique glow mask DIY here!
strTitle: Ticket for Myeongdong 3D Black Art

strIntroduction: Is there any place to go instead of shopping in Seoul? Actually, traditional palaces, museums and significant scenery also brim over the city. No more hesitation! Come and join in the culture exploration tour!
strTitle: 【Let's explore the Korean cultures!】Furniture Museum．Unhyungung Palace． Jogyesa Temple．Insa-dong Tour

strIntroduction: Have you ever dream of being a shining artist? As all of us know, it's hardly to enter Korea's entertainment company. However, here's a rare chance to experience this "cultivating system". Rainbow Bridge Company now offers opportunity for you to experience processes of transforming into K-POP stars.
strTitle: K-POP Educational Training & Tour program

strIntroduction: 你也是熱衷於韓劇、韓綜的狂熱份子嗎？那對鐵道腳踏車、南怡島、晨靜樹木園這些拍攝勝地一定再熟悉不過吧！創意大變身的rail bike、美不勝收的南怡島與樹木園，不論有沒有耳聞，都不妨來見見他們的廬山真面目吧！
strTitle: 【來韓國踏青嚕！】江村鐵道腳踏車 南怡島 晨靜樹木園一日遊

strIntroduction: 好想見見電視上的歐巴跟努那本人喔！特別規劃的粉絲江南一日遊，從狎鷗亭一路到經紀公司與電視台，說不定下個路口就遇見那位明星，轉角遇見你的愛
strTitle: 【阿 是歐巴！】給想巧遇韓星的你，韓國江南一日遊

strIntroduction: You can not only appreciate the beauty of traditional architecture but touch and experience Korean traditional culture in Bukchon Hanok Village. Just come to create your own totem with dyeing!!
strTitle: Bukchon Hanok Village Dyeing DIY

strIntroduction: 在明洞逛街逛到累了嗎？快來療癒咖啡店Mr. Healing，好好休息充電，為接下來的旅程儲備體力吧！
strTitle: 【首爾逛累了嗎？來咖啡店按摩】Mr. Healing 療癒咖啡店預約

strIntroduction: 旅行中最享受的兩件事就是購物和美容啦！讓我們帶你前往韓國在地人最推薦的溫泉勝地，體驗各式季節限定的特色浴池。充飽電後再到著名的驪州outlet血拚一番，低於免稅店的價錢絕對讓你買到手軟，捨不得離開！
strTitle: 【韓享受！】利川溫泉樂園、陶藝村、 驪州outlet一日遊

strIntroduction: Have you ever envied movie characters taking the yacht to enjoy the romantic seascape? Now, you can take the top yacht to enjoy happy time in Busan!!
strTitle: [Luxury experience]Busan The Bay101 yacht ticket

strIntroduction: Known as "the Hawaii of Korea," Jeju island has marvelous ocean view. Besides, Monsant café, opened by G-Dragon, can make you not only feel the charm of GD but also glance beautiful scene. With shuttle service, you can easily travel around Jeju island.
strTitle: 1-day Western Jeju Island tour

strIntroduction: Known as "the Hawaii of Korea," Jeju island provides various outdoor activities. To glance the most attractive beach in Jeju, Udo island is a must-go spot. After that, you can follow the shuttle to meet the sunset with rape flower in Seongsan Ilchulbong!
strTitle: 1-day Eastern Jeju Island tour

strIntroduction: Do you feel tired or have edema after these days having fun in Seoul? Han-nan SPA, the well-facilitated spa center with skillful massagists, situated at the center of Seoul. Not only does it have convenient location, but close to the famous sightseeing spot, Namsan Tower and Myeong-dong shopping area! Remember to relax yourself and let fatigue be swept away over here in your next Seoul trip!
strTitle: [Detox, relax and get pretty] Korea Seoul Han-nan SPA

strIntroduction: 一生一次美麗的夢幻想象，讓我們幫你實現！想要有個與眾不同的婚禮嗎？選擇近年來風行的韓式婚紗，不但可以享受最高的拍攝品質，還可以順便來個婚前小蜜月，留下彼此最美好的回憶哦！
strTitle: 【我們結婚了】奢華浪漫韓國韓式婚紗拍攝代辦

strIntroduction: 一直令人夢寐以求的韓國婚紗，現在以呈現新娘自然優雅的氣質為主，色階柔和淡雅，特寫氣質滿分，全景則有完美比例。不僅model拍起來好看，在照片中每對新人看起來都宛如韓劇男女主角一樣美麗帥氣，浪漫又優雅的氛圍絕對值得一試！
strTitle: 【小資情侶專屬】首爾人氣婚紗攝影棚＋韓式妝髮＋平價韓國迷你婚紗攝影

strIntroduction: 電視上的明星各個都在國外完成終身大事讓你十分羨慕嗎？即使不能在國外完成婚禮，至少要和另一伴在國外拍婚紗紀念兩人的愛情吧！無論是即將結婚的準新人，或是已經攜手多年的夫妻都適合，趕緊帶著你的他來韓國留下你們幸福美麗的模樣吧！
strTitle: 【來韓國拍婚紗就對了！】捕捉幸福模樣 韓國婚紗代辦

strIntroduction: 讓我們帶你走進美如夢境般的碧草地文化公園，享受醉人的美景。此外，我們將前往美麗的葡萄酒莊園，除了參觀酒窖之外，更讓你體驗紅葡萄酒裝瓶DIY 。來到韓國，親自動手體驗當地文化，留下旅行中最特別的回憶吧！
strTitle: 【微醺小旅行】葡萄酒窖＋碧草地文化樹木園一日遊

strIntroduction: The Yongsan Dragon Hill Spa is a charcoal sauna permeated with an oak fragrance created by traditional heating techniques. A Visit to the Luxurious “Dragon Hill Spa” in Seoul.
strTitle: Dragon Hill Spa tickets

strIntroduction: Remarkable voice-less show performed by one of the well-known Korean artists, Lin He Pil. A show which content is all about daily life, presented in a various performance combined with magic, mime, shadow show, and sand painting.
strTitle: [Mime that makes you laugh out loud!] Seoul Funtasy show

strIntroduction: 想更認識首爾之外的韓國嗎？空出一天的時間來趟全州之旅吧！臣服於馬耳山風景之美、在可愛有趣的全州壁畫村留下身影，或是化身韓國閨女與貴公子穿著韓服穿梭在韓屋間...最有趣的韓式之旅等你來體驗喔！
strTitle: 【穿著韓服趴趴走】馬耳山 x 全州韓屋村 壁畫村 x 全州教堂 韓式風景一日遊

strIntroduction: One of the must-see shows in Korea, Nanta, combines Korean instrument which can break down national boundaries. Regardless of language and age, everyone will definitely fall for this show! Hey! Next time when you're in Korea, remember to experience this special drama culture!
strTitle: “NANTA” Show Ticket at Hongdae

strIntroduction: 《花樣跳舞爺爺》是一部闔家觀賞的幽默喜劇，在表演中融入歌曲、舞蹈等豐富元素將音樂和影像合為一體，十分輕鬆搞笑。而演出全程都配有中、英文字幕，完全不用擔心語言問題，可以放心地盡情享受花樣爺爺帶給你的樂趣！
strTitle: 【爺爺也瘋狂】韓國喜劇花樣跳舞爺爺門票

strIntroduction: Learn how to cook the famous Korean Bulgogi, visit the historical Changdeokgung Palace, experience traditional Korea at Namsan Hanok Village, and see unexpected natural beauty in the city at Cheonggyecheon Stream. During this small-group cooking class in Seoul, gain a unique insight into Korean food culture by learning the secrets to creating the country’s most popular dishes. Whether you consider yourself a novice or an expert in the kitchen, you’ll love this cooking course that is tailored specifically to your skill level. The best part of this tour – you’ll get to dine on your creations with your fellow food enthusiasts!
strTitle: Changdeokgung Palace & Namsan Hanok Village+Korean Food Cooking Class
Private Korean Cultural Heritage Tour Including Seokguram Grotto, Bulguksa Temple and Cheonmachong

strIntroduction: Rainbow cake! Marshmallow ice cream! Cheese Ribs! Beef and Pork Intestine! You may ask "Can traditional Korean snack survive in this competitive food world?" Not until you try them will you know how tasty they are. Seize this food adventure opportunity; it won't let you down!!
strTitle: 【Food in Korea】Makgeolli & Bindae Tteok, Korean Wine & Pancake

strIntroduction: 特色咖啡廳已經成為韓國近年來最大的亮點，放下手邊的一切，來到市郊閉目養神，放空一下。我們將帶你前往被評為全世界必造訪的25個咖啡店之一的相機咖啡館，用一杯咖啡配上眼前的田園美景，享受屬於你的寧靜時光吧！
strTitle: 【韓國電影、婚紗拍攝地】相機咖啡館 兩水里 首爾外郊漫步遊
Private Busan Countryside Tour: Andong Hahoe Folk Village

strIntroduction: Visit the impressive Hwaseong Fortress and the Hwaseong Haenggung Castle. And then, see the latest lineup of Samsung products at the Samsung Electronics building in Seocho-dong, explore the National Museum of Korea and visit the Unhyeongung Royal Residence.
strTitle: Hwaseong Fortress, Samsung D'light & Unhyungung Palace

strIntroduction: 嚮往韓劇裡大家一同坐在汗蒸幕裡大啖雞蛋，喝著甜米酒（식혜）的場景嗎？是否想體驗綁著咩咩頭造型在汗蒸幕房裡與三五好友聊天呢？而恰巧仁寺洞正是文化氣息十分濃厚的首爾地標，下次來韓國別忘了來標榜繼承正統韓國汗蒸幕的仁寺洞汗蒸幕體驗看看喔！
strTitle: 【從裡到外一概保養】韓國仁寺洞汗蒸幕 門票

strIntroduction: 旅行時除了安排當地必去的景點之外，文化體驗更是讓整趟旅程更有趣的調味料！快讓釜山在地歐爸帶你造訪有韓國聖托里尼之稱，七彩繽紛的壁畫村，吃完韓國傳統美食後再進行跆拳道體驗，有吃又有玩，給你最豐富的釜山一日遊！
strTitle: 【釜山人帶路】傳統美食＋跆拳道，最道地的文化體驗！

strIntroduction: Pacific Land, located within the complex of Jungmun Resort, the facility offers three performances upon admission including dolphin show, sea lion show and monkey show. There is also a special dolphin water show available for viewing. Don't forget to bring your children to enjoy a lovely day here!
strTitle: Jeju Island Pacific Land Premiere Tickets

strIntroduction: ＂NO WIFI NO LIFE！＂沒有網路我活不下去阿！身在人身地不熟的韓國，少了網路的幫忙景點怎麼去、美食該怎麼找？你的旅遊最佳夥伴，有他在到哪都能玩得開心又安心！
strTitle: 【沒有網路活不下去啊！】韓國WiFi機租借
Best of Busan With Yonggungsa Temple, Yongdusan Park and Dongbaek Island

strIntroduction: 相信在每個女孩的心中都有個小小的願望，希望能當世界上最美的新娘 。這樣的心願就交給我們來替你實現吧！由韓國最頂級的婚紗團隊為你提供最優質的服務，在珍藏一生的婚紗照中留下妳最美麗的身影吧！
strTitle: 留下最美的瞬間，韓國頂級婚紗攝影

strIntroduction: 讓你可以一展身手，擁有絕對安全裝備的明洞實彈射擊場！除了知名韓星金秀賢等都曾在這體驗外，實力堅強的射擊教練親自上陣指導，即使新手上路也有機會百發百中喔！採用環保實彈材料製作，無菸射擊，和老公、男友來首爾玩怕他無聊嗎？帶他來這裡準沒錯呢！
strTitle: 【百發百中】首爾明洞實彈射擊體驗

strIntroduction: Visit the Unhyungung Royal Residence and the Dongdaemun Design Plaza(DDP). Try street food in Gwangjang Market. Enjoy shopping at the most popular luxury-brand fashion mall in Seoul, and much more!
strTitle: 【Gangnam Style】Shopping tour at DDP & Gangnam District
Admission to Everland Theme Park or Caribbean Bay Water Park with Transport from Seoul
Gangnam District Tour in Seoul Including COEX Aquarium and Han River Cruise

strIntroduction: 追星？血拚？大吃大喝？誰說去韓國都只能做這些事！古建築、宮殿、韓式風景更是讓人對這座城市深深著迷的原因，想更認識韓國嗎？那趕緊空出半天的時間來跟她培養感情吧！
strTitle: 【韓國傳統文化巡禮】韓屋 宮廷建築 特色博物館

strIntroduction: Door-to-Door transfer between the Incheon International Airport and hotels in Seoul. The most convenient pick-up service ever. 24 hours a day and 7 days a week.
strTitle: (Twenty Four Seven 24/7 Private pick-up) Incheon International to Airport Hotel

strIntroduction: 你是否曾經看著韓劇，幻想著自己是劇中主角呢？KKday帶你變身一日韓劇主角，享受明星級的待遇，並在各個韓劇經典場景進行甜蜜的情侶拍攝，為你捕捉每個自然流露的幸福瞬間！
strTitle: 【主角換你做】韓劇＂龍八夷＂金泰熙拍攝場景體驗

strIntroduction: 每晚坐在電視前看著韓劇時，是否常常幻想自己是那美美的女主角，滿心期望著白馬王子都教授的出現呢？精心安排一連串拍攝體驗，漫步於充滿歐風的小王子村，留下最最特別又浪漫的回憶！
strTitle: 【叫我千頌伊】韓國小法國浪漫拍攝體驗
'My Love From The Star' TV Tour Including Petite France

strIntroduction: 來韓國最不能錯過的特色體驗之一就是汗蒸幕啦！森林韓方樂園汗蒸幕位於首爾市中心，仍然保留古早天然橡樹木柴生火供熱而成的蒸房，木炭窯和三溫暖，最具有傳統韓國特色的汗蒸幕哦，來這放鬆全身，得到療癒後再出發吧！
strTitle: 【韓國養生偏方】首爾森林韓方樂園汗蒸幕

strIntroduction: 冬季來韓國一定不能錯過有趣又刺激的滑雪行程！KKday派出隨團攝影師，替你記錄今年冬天最美好的滑雪回憶！
strTitle: 韓國芝山冬季滑雪一天團＋隨團攝影跟拍服務

strIntroduction: 2016年由貞洞劇場全新推出的－YOULL律，是一齣結合舞蹈、武藝、劍術、音樂及板索裡的綜合性傳統表演。有別於以往貞洞劇演出內容大致是重新詮釋古典小說，初登場的律可是貞洞劇場少數的＂創作＂呢！喜愛充滿韓味公演的你，這次來首爾可別忘了欣賞完律再走呦！
strTitle: 【2016全新登場】首爾貞洞劇場 YOULL律 公演門票

strIntroduction: 位於加平的晨靜樹木園，如畫般絕美的四季景緻吸引了各地的遊客，除了是眾多韓劇的拍攝地首選外，更是婚紗拍攝熱門地點之一，由隨行攝影師捕捉最自然的瞬間，怎麼拍怎麼美，為您留下旅行中最美好的回憶！
strTitle: 【韓劇＂她很漂亮＂拍攝地】晨靜樹木園戶外寫真拍攝

strIntroduction: All the trees in Seoul are very straight and tall. Even for the window shopping people can see the ulterior motives decoration at the holidays or festival period. Couples kiss or hug each other on the streets without a damn about other people's sights. Let's take a walk with Seoul couples at hiding alley's beautiful scenery.
strTitle: Let's fall in Love with Seoul

strIntroduction: Door-to-Door transfer between the Gimpo International Airport and hotels in Seoul. The most convenient pick-up service ever. 24 hours a day and 7 days a week.
strTitle: (Twenty Four Seven 24/7 Private pick-up) Gimpo International to Airport Hotel
Private Tour of Junam Wetlands and Haeinsa Temple

strIntroduction: 汗蒸幕到底是什麼，跟一般的SPA有什麼不同嗎？韓國獨有的特色體驗－汗蒸幕，初訪韓國的你絕對要親自走一遭！LK SPA位在首爾市中心鄰近明洞及東大門，逛街購物之餘還可以放鬆身心，紓解疲勞又可養顏美容，讓你更美麗的漫步於首爾街道中！
strTitle: 【給我牛奶般的好膚質！】首爾 LK SPA 汗蒸幕體驗

strIntroduction: Finally! We can get rid of heavy luggage! In stead of saving your energy, KAL provides a cheaper but convenient way for you to transport between Incheon and Seoul.
strTitle: KAL Limousine Bus
Korean Palace and Market Tour in Seoul Including Insadong and Gyeongbokgung Palace

strIntroduction: Seoul Grevin Museum, the fourth Grevin Museum in the world, is the first waxwork museum in Asia. Exhibiting over 88 wax figures, including movie stars, sports players, and all celebrities over the world, Grevin is viewed as a highly recommended spots for tourists who wanna experience new stuff. Have you been to this living museum yet? If not, just schedule it in your trip!
strTitle: Seoul Grevin Living Waxwork Museum tickets

strIntroduction: There's no more need of carrying heavy luggages rushing from aiprort to downtown or either way! Private pick-up will not only never let you down, but save your time and energy. Hey, the highest cost-performance ratio pick-up product is right here waiting for you!
strTitle: Jeju Airport Pick up Service

strIntroduction: 來到仁川搭乘海鷗船，迎著海風，體驗餵海鷗的樂趣；走進松月島童話壁畫村，五彩繽紛的夢幻背景絕對讓你的快門停不下來，最後再跟著五星級韓廚學習韓式炸醬麵，把道地的味道帶回家，有吃有看又有玩超滿足！
strTitle: 【仁川一日遊】 海鷗船餵食體驗，松月童話村，韓式炸醬麵DIY
Korean Palace and Temple Tour in Seoul: Gyeongbokgung Palace and Jogyesa Temple

strIntroduction: Jeju chartered tour really suits family! With Chinese/English speaking tour guide and shuttle service, you can go wherever you want!
strTitle: 1-day Jeju Island tour with guide
Seoul History and Culture Small-Group Tour

strIntroduction: 免租借，免填資料，7天爆量3GB上網
strTitle: Korea 7 days (3GB) SIM card, Taiwan shipping only

strIntroduction: The City Tour bus, which is one of the special features in Seoul, will take you to plenty popular place in the downtown of Seou. Different from other courses, it'll bring you to some historical and traditional spots. You can learn Korea's history simply by taking the tour bus!
strTitle: Learning history by taking tour bus! Seoul City Sightseeing Bus Ticket

strIntroduction: 以壯麗的自然景觀聞名的濟州島，滋潤愛情的浪漫旅程，一同乘坐山房山郵輪，遊賞大長今拍攝地－挾才裡海岸，聯合國教科文組織地質公園指定地－山房山，以及濟州島五大火山及十大美景之一的山房窟寺等美景！
strTitle: 【浪漫首選】濟州島山房山遊覽船

strIntroduction: Door-to-Door transfer between the Gimpo International Airport and hotels in Seoul. The most convenient pick-up service ever. 24 hours a day and 7 days a week.
strTitle: (Twenty Four Seven 24/7 Shared pick-up) Gimpo International to Airport Hotel

strIntroduction: 初學者首選行程，冬季來韓國旅遊的最佳體驗！提供所有裝備與初學者教學課程，今年冬天就來首爾滑雪吧
strTitle: Ski Tour in Seoul
Contemporary Art Tour in Seoul

strIntroduction: 女人當自強，女人我最大，都是女性成員的打擊樂團，實力堅強的團隊，誰說女人一定要會撒嬌？得獎無數，快來看她們精彩的表演吧，視覺與聽覺的雙重享受～
